name: I'll Give You 10 Seconds
description:
This is a game based on a brief called "Keep It Personal", where the task was to make a game about something very personal to us. I'll Give You 10 Seconds based on a real experience, about feeling powerless and the importance of consent.



For everything that hasn't been made by me, please view the Credits-page in game.

Trigger Warning! - Non-consensual themes,  sexual harassment.

Other Warning! - Some flashing images.
